message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find valuable.  I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire something truly special.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. This is my best offer at the moment.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $900,000 is a strong offer, the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This is a very competitive price for something of this caliber.
I understand that the product has value, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $950,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
